title: Big Man Moderators
body:
So you think you're some kind of big man mod squad?

You let people be mean and belittle you and you just take it in stride? And you think that makes you quality people? To allow trolls to just vent and rant about the quality of your volunteer, unpaid service? Huh?

Is that whatcha think?

Psh. Real men take an eye for an eye! Totes. Yeah. Throw some hands mod squad, GD needs a good battle royale, it's been too long. Let's see some sparks flying!
